title: Curtain Panels, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: applique and embroidery on moire ground
description: White moire ground with an applique of teacups, urns and various ornamental vessels cut from many kinds of silk fabrics and outlined with couched gold thread. Medium blue silk damask borders on sides and bottom, scalloped and finished with narrow gold ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Curtain Panels, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: applique and embroidery on moire ground. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1192-a,b.
